description: To keep pace with population growth and increasing urban density, VINCI Construction helps meet the need for housing, office and hotel infrastructure. VINCI Construction combines innovation capacity and ability to adapt to a wide variety of socioeconomic environments to help cities and governments address major societal issues.
name: Buildings
